p: HD3086 showed maximum expression of SOD (3.2-fold) under T 2. A significant increase in the expression of SOD was observed with HS ( Fig. 7c). Similarly, AGPase (LSU) and SSS showed maximum expression under T 1 and further downregulation was observed. The expression of SSS in HD3086 was observed maximum (1.85-fold) under T 1. We observed downregulation in SSS under T 2 treatment ( Fig. 7c).Similarly, BT-Schomburgk showed maximum POX expression (3.9-fold) under T 2 ( Fig. 7d). Abundance of POX transcript was observed, as compared to SOD under HS.
